Package com.hexaware.dao

Class VirtualArtGallerydao

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.VirtualArtGallerydao
public class VirtualArtGallerydao extends Object
The `VirtualArtGallerydao` class provides data access functionality for the Virtual Art Gallery system. It includes methods for inserting, updating, and retrieving artwork, artist, user, and gallery information from the underlying database.

    • updateArtwork

      public void updateArtwork(int artworkId, String title, String description, String medium, String imageUrl)
      Updates artwork details in the database.
      Parameters:
      artworkId - The ID of the artwork to be updated.
      title - The new title of the artwork.
      description - The new description of the artwork.
      medium - The new medium of the artwork.
      imageUrl - The new image URL of the artwork.

    • removeArtwork

      Parameters:
      artworkId - The ID of the artwork to be removed.

    • getArtwork

      public Artwork getArtwork(int artworkId)
      Retrieves artwork details from the database based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      artworkId - The ID of the artwork to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An Artwork object containing the details of the retrieved artwork.

    • getUserfavArtworkId

      public List<Integer> getUserfavArtworkId(int userId)
      Retrieves a list of artwork IDs that are favorites for a given user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A List of Integer containing artwork IDs.

    • searchArtworkByKeyword

      public List<Artwork> searchArtworkByKeyword(String keyword)
      Searches for artworks in the database based on a keyword.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to search for in the title or description of artworks.
      Returns:
      A List of Artwork objects containing the matching artworks.

    • userIdExists

      public boolean userIdExists(int userId)

      Returns:

    • getGalleryById

      public Gallery getGalleryById(int galleryId)
      Retrieves a gallery from the database based on the specified gallery ID.
      Parameters:
      galleryId - The unique identifier of the gallery to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A `Gallery` object representing the gallery with the specified ID, or `null` if no gallery is found.
